alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued December 24 at 1:52AM EST until December 25 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. For the Coastal Flood Statement, isolated minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Coastal Palm Beach County. * WHEN...For the High Rip Current Risk, through late tonight. For the Coastal Flood Statement, from 6 AM to 11 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High tide at Lake Worth will occur at 8:30 AM.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
